create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chats (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

fetch.by_id: SELECT id, name, created_at FROM chats WHERE id = %s;
fetch.all: SELECT id, name, created_at FROM chats;
fetch.by_user: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.created_at FROM chats c JOIN chat_members cm ON c.id = cm.chat_id WHERE cm.user_id = %s;
